translations: v．不赞成，反对：表示对某事或某人的行为、观点等表示不满或不同意。

sentences.sentence: He disapproves of mothers going out to work; in fact, he disapproves very strongly.
sentences.translation: 他不赞成作母亲的出外工作；事实上他极力反对这事。

sentences.sentence: So these are forms of the experience of reading fiction of which Iser disapproves because there's no work being done.
sentences.translation: 这就是那些阅读小说经历的形式,伊瑟尔不赞同这种形式，因为这种阅读没有任何成就。
